item.title: My iTerm2 Setup
item.description: I extend the default installation of iTerm2 in the following ways. Key Shortcuts Move Cusrsor One Worl Left Keyboard shortcut: option + left arrow Action: Send Hex Code Code: 0x1b 0x62 Move Cusrsor One Worl Right Keyboard shortcut: option + right arrow Action: Send Hex Code Code: 0x1b 0x66 Colors I use the Selenized color palette.
